name: v tech-squad
overview:
V tech-squad Inc. is a cloud based technical support provider to consumers and small businesses.

V tech-squad provides cloud based technical services to consumers for their computers, PCs, MP3 players, phones such as iPhone and Blackberry and devices such as Printers, Scanners, Fax, Wireless networking gear, Netflix, Roku and TVs. V tech-squad also supports consumers in hooking up their Computers to gaming devices such as Xbox 360 and PS3.

It provides technical support service consumers and small businesses in United States, Canada and soon launching in United Kingdom and Australia.
